job_history.employer: Fondazione Bruno Kessler - ICT Research Centre
job_history.description: Managed and actively involved in software projects for social good. Coordinated the writing of grant proposals (including FP7 and H2020). Conducted research in ICT4D and Food Waste supply chain. Organized and conducted training in Mozambique and South Africa on Agile software development. Supervised students, junior developers, BS and MS computer science theses.

Developed a progressive web application for beverage wholesalers to receive orders directly from their clients. Responsibilities included leading the development process using Agile methods, supporting clients in the transition and business development.
Bootstrapped the development of a mobile application for peer-to-peer delivery using Ionic, Cordova and AngularJS. This included the introduction of coding standards and best practices.
